quote_first: The Lenox Station was easily reached on time. The hands of the big clock were only at
quote_last: when Cyrus entered. At the designated spot the messenger met him. Cyrus recognized the man as a porter on one of the trains of the road of which his grandfather and father were officers. Why, yes, he was the porter of the Woodbridge special car!
title: A Court of Inquiry
author: Grace S. Richmond

quote_last: , so all the shows were about silliness or murder.
title: Slaughterhouse 5
author: Kurt Vonnegut
